title: ADC/Top main looking for a team or support
body: When I'm not self sabotaging my winrate due to boredom, I'm actually not bad. Gold last season, would like to say I play at high gold skill level when I'm being serious.

replies.body:
Hey Guys

I am trying to get a bit of a team/community together for improving together.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/kaB0hk15-lets-make-an-improvement-focused-flex-teamcommunity-bronze-silver-gold

i am a support main, can mid and top as well but support is my bread and butter. keep getting to gold promos but lose and need a good adc to help get me there and then carry eachother further, add me if you like, TAG is TimmyTubesock, 23 M
Add me silver to gold team,... JJJAYROD
